JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description:Develop Database structure and work on its software integration.Work on improvement of existing database management structure and its implementation.Work on front end and back end software development on Visual studio Platform.Build functional prototypes to solve internal and external use-case.Working with different tools and technologies to deliver end-to-end solutions.Profile Requirements:Strong Proficiency in Database Management system, SQL and C++.knowledge of Development in Visual Studio Environment.Possess strong Computer Science fundamentals - Data Structures and Algorithms,Networking and Operating Systems.Knowledge of 3rd party integrations, native packages with proper testing & code version management (Git).Knowledge of computer vision/image processing and its libraries such as opencv will be preferred.Excellent communication skills with being able to work independently.. Freshers can apply.Should be able to work in minimal supervision.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers
EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Computers
